participant_1.background:
I am single and enjoy my independence.
I like to relax and eat watermelon on the weekend.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
i play soccer professionally.
I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy spending my free time surfing and learning new things about the ocean.
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.
My ethnicity is not important, but my feet hurt after long runs in my boots.
i work on trucks.
I don't have my own car, but I'm working on it!

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! How are you?
I'm doing alright, thanks for asking!
That's good to hear! What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out, relaxing and eating watermelon.
That sounds like a great way to spend a day! I love watermelon.
It's so delicious! What are you doing today?
I'm working on a truck. I work on trucks as a job.
Oh, that's cool! I don't know much about trucks, but I'm sure it's a lot of work.
It can be, but it's also a lot of fun!
That's good to hear! What do you like most about your job?
I like working on different types of trucks and learning new things.
That sounds really interesting! I bet it's really rewarding to see your work come together.
It is! I love seeing the finished product and knowing that I had a part in it.
That's amazing! I'm sure your family is proud of you.
They are! I'm lucky to have such a supportive family.
That's great to hear! I'm glad that you have such a great support system.
